meanings.sent1: The biocenosis in the forest includes various animals and plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the biocenosis of the coral reef to understand its ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The biocenosis of squirrels and birds in the park creates a lively environment.
meanings.sent4: The biocenosis of bacteria in the soil is like a bustling city underground.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the biocenosis of the pond revealed a world teeming with life.

meanings.definition: The living organisms in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The biocenosis of the pond includes fish, frogs, and algae.
meanings.sent2: The biocenosis of the desert is adapted to survive in harsh conditions.
meanings.sent3: The biocenosis of the backyard seems to have its own little society.
meanings.sent4: In the biocenosis of the ocean, each creature plays a unique role.
meanings.sent5: Observing the biocenosis of the meadow reveals a delicate balance of nature.
